HEYWAIT.SETTINGS.restrictGmHint: Triggering of the Hey, Wait! tiles will be locked down to only player's token movement and not the GM.
HEYWAIT.SETTINGS.dispositionHint: The token disposition types that are allowed to trigger Hey, Wait! tiles.
HEYWAIT.SETTINGS.warpPlayersHint: Triggering a Hey, Wait! tile on a scene that a player isn't viewing will warp them to that scene. GMs will always be warped regardless.
HEYWAIT.SETTINGS.disableSfxHint: Disables playing sound effects when anyone triggers Hey, Wait! tiles.
HEYWAIT.TILECONFIG.unlimitedHint: If selected, after the Hey, Wait! tile is triggered, other tokens will still be able to trigger it.
HEYWAIT.TILECONFIG.targetHint: Hold CTRL to select multiple targets, only selected targets will be able to trigger this tile. Only shows actors in scene. Leave empty to allow every character to trigger this tile.
HEYWAIT.TILECONFIG.elevationHint: If set, this Tile will only trigger on tokens above elevation bottom and below elevation top. Leave empty to trigger at any elevation
HEYWAIT.TILECONFIG.UnlimitedWarn: Unlimited Triggers can't be toggled, Disable unlimited triggers first!
